reviews.review_text: This game is both awesome and terrible. The creative element is amazing! Really clever and cute. Lots of replayability and humour as to how you lost this round. Its like lego but you are on the losing side all the time.... if it was a game.  That said, it is quite rewarding when you make something really badass!

Rigonauts is the fantastical building battle game from Engient. Snap together the ultimate vessel and send your crew of Hobs into battle. With a well designed ship and a clever plan, your crew will smash and blast past an assortment of strange and dangerous foes. Of course no single plan survives the enemy and each tactical tweak will bring you closer to victory.

Mildly entertaining puzzle game. The tiny bit of novelty in making your own designs wears off early and is quickly replaced with a sense of agonizing boredom as you rebuild your ship from the same base over and over and over for every level. Enemy AI seems target at a random. This is a good game in small doses, maybe 20 - 25 minutes at a time. Wait for a sale though, $9.99 is too much for what you get here. If you see it for 75% off, go for it.
This game sucks. Creative, But sucks. All in all, you have to have stars. And its reaaaaally annoying to go back and do that.
